pr_title: Don't Fail When Encountering Evicted Pooled Transaction Hash

timeline.message:
ignore evicted hashes

Signed-off-by: Ratan Rai Sur <ratan.r.sur@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: I'm assuming there is some reason to go from a for loop iteration to a direct iterator.  Is it because the iterator handles the unstable collection better?
timeline.author: shemnon

replies.bodyText: As far as I know you can't catch the exception and continue over the syntactic sugar iterator.
replies.author: RatanRSur

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to specialize this type to EveictingQueue?  Isn't iterator available in Queue via the Collection supertype?
timeline.author: shemnon

replies.bodyText: I was just making it more specific since I was here anyways. Return specific, accept general and all that.
replies.author: RatanRSur
